title: build: llvm error when build prysm from source on macos
body:
# üêû Bug Report ### Description build error on macos ### Has this worked before in a previous version? it's ok on linux but not for mac ## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction ## üî• Error

v2.0.6
**Anything else relevant (validator index / public key)?**

I think that release builds only work on linux at this time. Someone with darwin/arm64 will have to take a look. 

Do you have xcode build tools installed (`xcodebuild --version`)?

I wonder if it would work with g++ instead of llvm...

Not yet, only `CommandLineTools`, I can install it now.

And, I tried to build prysm with llvm13 and llvm14, but I failed.
Does it work now that xcodebuild is installed?

When I build with `bazel-5.1.0-darwin-arm64`:

```
% ./bazel-5.1.0-darwin-arm64 version
Build label: 5.1.0
Build target: bazel-out/darwin_arm64-opt/bin/src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/bazel/BazelServer_deploy.jar
Build time: Thu Mar 24 14:22:07 2022 (1648131727)
Build timestamp: 1648131727
Build timestamp as int: 1648131727
vie@Vie prysm % ./bazel-5.1.0-darwin-arm64 build //beacon-chain:beacon-chain --config=release
WARNING: /Users/vie/project/prysm/beacon-chain/BUILD.bazel:3:14: target '//beacon-chain:beacon-chain' is deprecated: This target has moved to //cmd/beacon-chain:beacon-chain
ERROR: /private/var/tmp/_bazel_vie/393fe119889f7a13bb777ea02f597f70/external/prysm_toolchains/BUILD.bazel:148:10: configurable attribute "toolchain" in @prysm_toolchains//:cc-toolchain-multiarch doesn't match this configuration. Would a default condition help?

For more help, see https://docs.bazel.build/configurable-attributes.html#why-doesnt-my-select-choose-what-i-expect.

ERROR: Analysis of target '//beacon-chain:beacon-chain' failed; build aborted: 
INFO: Elapsed time: 56.447s
INFO: 0 processes.
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully (41 packages loaded, 177 targets configured)
```

Is it because the compiler did not find the corresponding version of the llvm package for the system?
Bazel build now works on M1 and M2 macs. Please let us know if this issue is still present
`bazel build //beacon-chain:beacon-chain` is ok but `bazel build //beacon-chain:beacon-chain --config=release` still had this error.
We could update llvm to a more recent one. 10.0.0 is 2 years old

> https://discord.com/channels/476244492043812875/701094045879107744/1009429658112102421
> 
> Is this relevant?

No, I don't think the two are the same error.  
Although both errors occur after adding `--config=release`, but  I don't think the cause of the error is quite the same.
This error caused by llvm.

> We could update llvm to a more recent one. 10.0.0 is 2 years old

Yes, we should upgrade it to the latest version. 
 I tried to upgrade llvm before, but obviously, I failed.
closing due to raul testing on mac m1 in #11310
